title: Not Impressed
review:
Why or how anyone would want to sit through this movie and give it anything above a 2/10...I really couldn't tell you but I can guess that maybe they're "getting something out of it".
A terrible attempt at rewriting Shakespeare's Macbeth is not only a bad idea, it also leads to a long boring result that's as interesting and terrifying as watching pain dry. Don't waste your time, I wasted mine for you.

title: Horrible
review: It was horrible, slow and a very low budget type of a movie, actors with no talent whatsoever. Plot? What plot, felt like there were some random scenes only. Sharknado compared with this one was a masterpiece.

title: Other reviews are right!
review: The other reviews hit the nail on the head. This move is intolerable. I can't believe something this bad could ever be made and taken serious. After 5 min I was wondering why I waited so long to turn it off.
